Manticore Operations

Manticore Solutions is a UK based, casual-milsim community founded upon the idea of avoiding the hurdles of other milsim-like groups. To that end, we say no to mandatory training, ranks, saluting and other red tape that we feel detracts from the sense of community the fun experience Arma has to offer.

All members are free to sign up for any position they wish for any operation, including infantry, ground and air assets. Furthermore, our community features an extensive, high-quality mod-set, optimized and refined to provide maximum content for minimum cost to your storage, building on mods like RHS and 3CB to provide a well-rounded and diverse experience.

By joining Manticore Operations youâ€™ll be entering a community of friendly and active players with no formal attendance requirements. We are interested in people who are ready to engage with the community, make new friends, and play in an atmosphere of positivity.
